entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent warning and error for similar patterns that always fail #59860
  • roslyn.visualstudio.integrationtests.visualbasic.basiclinecommit.commitonsave #59855
  • Call hierarchy nesting is unnecessarily complicated #59853
  • Visual Studio hive preparation can take 15 minutes in roslyn-integration-CI #59851
  • Debugging a Source Generator when added to an xUnit testing project does not work #59850
  • Race condition in parameter hints when inserting argument name #59843
  • Understanding Hot Reload incremental update formats. Specifically, WatchHotReloadService.Update #59840
  • wrong "Remove unnecessary suppression" warning #59837
    Backlog
  • Pressing 'enter' in a single-line raw-string-literal should convert it to multi-line. #59835
  • Remove Unused References not work #59834
  • ArgumentException from EditAndContinue.ActiveStatementTaggerProvider.ProduceTagsAsync #59830
    17.2
  • InvalidOperationException from ActiveStatementTrackingService.TrackingSession.CreateTrackingSpans #59829
    17.2
  • NullReferenceException from EditAndContinue.BreakpointSpans.TryGetBreakpointSpan #59827
    17.2
  • InvalidOperationException from DebuggingSession.GetBaseActiveStatementSpansAsync #59826
    17.2

Closed

  • Unexpected overload resolution using static abstracts in interfaces #59721
  • Compiler should provide a better error message for generic type constraint 'enum' #59495
    17.2
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -1066598274 #59799
  • RemoteInvocationException: This program location is thought to be unreachable. #59636
  • Pattern matching error leads to MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #59804
    17.2
  • [Unity] Telegram.Td.dll - Assets\Example.cs(4,12): error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'Telegram' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) #59557
  • Repo Survey (2022 Edition) #59221
    17.2
  • Default parameters of interface type are silently set to null for string constants #59789
    17.2
  • Xml doc comment munging param names #26292
    Backlog
  • Problem with build on .Net 5 preview 7 on Ubuntu: The operation is not allowed on non-connected sockets. #46245
  • RegexGenerator does not work in Razor files #59780

PullRequests

Created

  • Testing to see what this breaks (3) #59866
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/rigibson/check prototype2 #59865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Testing to see what this breaks (1) #59864
    Area-IDE
  • Testing to see what this breaks (1) #59863
    Area-IDE
  • Check for prototype comments in separate job #59862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplifier experiment #59861
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59859
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59858
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update PublishData for 17.3 #59857
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Address layering of navigation action in code actions #59856
    Area-IDE
  • Port additional tests to the new integration test harness #59854
    Area-IDE
  • Use ExceptionUtilities.UnexpectedValue instead of Unreachable #59849
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix issues pressing 'enter' in a raw string literal #59848
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow string null constant as pattern for Span<char> #59847
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate BreakpointSpans and fix NREs #59846
    Area-IDE
  • Notify docs team for new breaking change documentation #59844
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Account for possible cache invalidation on a different thread in assert. #59842
    Area-Compilers
  • Port new rename UI to release/dev17.2 #59841
    Area-IDE
  • Ignore documents from projects that do not support EnC when calculating active statements #59839
    Area-Interactive
  • Async navigation5 #59838
    Area-IDE
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59831
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make navigate-to navigation cancellable. #59828
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add feature to fixup code when user transposes 'record' in a declaration #59652
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Unify our test artifacts directory to upload more stuff on failure #59822
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add OmniSharpCompletionService.GetDescriptionAsync #59782
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Backport "Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build" to 17.0 #59588
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary components from devcontainer #59825
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59852
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Port more tests #59783
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Don't get nullable slot if property sub-pattern has error #59813
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Change navigation helpers to operate in two steps. #59798
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59832
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Disallow converted string as default argument value #59806
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove inaccurate section of doc comment #59821
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records, Next
  • Merge features/rename_ui_rework into main #59779
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust checklist for merging new compiler feature #59816
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59833
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59814
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update config for snap #59824
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merges/main to release/dev17.2 #59823
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Allow generate ctor intent to specify accessibility #59730
    Area-IDE
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Update go-to-def handler to support entirely async go-to-def operation. #59801
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add note about redirection for documenting IDExxxx #59107
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Create attribute default arguments during binding #59750
    Area-Compilers
